item.description:
You've seen them on TV. Lets try decorating some cakes of our own! I know nothing about fondant. This won't be a class. But we can turn on the Food Network for inspiration and learn together.

If you have them, please bring:
- Rolling pin
- Your favorite cookie cutters
- Anything specific you want to add to your cake
- A plate to carry home your creation
- Your creativity!

I'll provide the cakes, some different colored fondant, frosting/icing, assorted sprinkles and decorations. They will be cake mixes from a box. If you have specific requests for cake flavor or shape (cupcakes, sheet, bundt, etc) let me know and I will try to accommodate. If you know what color fondant you want to use, that will help as well.

I will e-mail exact location/directions a few days before the event. But notice that Norton, MA is about 1 hr south of Boston.

Hopefully we can do much better than these Cake Wrecks.
item.name: Fun with Fondant (Cake Decorating)
